javadoc: Manages a queue of background tasks that execute commands.

methods.javadoc:
Construct a new ToolTaskManager.
@param tool tool associated with this ToolTaskManager
methods.name: <init>
getTaskThreadGroup
methods.comment:
Returns the thread group associated with all background tasks run by this
 manager and their instantiated threads.

methods.javadoc:
Get the monitor component that shows progress and has a cancel button.
@return the monitor component
methods.name: getMonitorComponent
methods.comment: Get the monitor component that shows progress and has a cancel button.

methods.javadoc:
Return true if a task is executing
@return true if a task is executing
methods.name: isBusy
methods.comment: Return true if a task is executing

return.comment: true if a task is executing

methods.name: execute
methods.comment: Execute the given command in the foreground

params.name: obj
params.comment: domain object to which the command will be applied

return.comment: the completion status of the command

methods.name: executeCommand
methods.comment: Execute the given command in the background

methods.name: scheduleFollowOnCommand
methods.comment: Schedule the given background command when the current command completes.

methods.name: stop
methods.comment:
Cancel the currently running task and clear all commands that are
 scheduled to run. Block until the currently running task ends.

params.name: wait
params.comment: if true wait for current task to cancel cleanly

methods.name: taskCompleted
methods.comment:
Notification from the BackgroundCommandTask that it has completed; queued
 or scheduled commands are executed.

params.name: task
params.comment: background command task that has completed

methods.javadoc: Clear the queue of scheduled commands.
methods.name: clearQueuedCommands
methods.comment: Clear the queue of scheduled commands.

methods.javadoc:
Clear all tasks associated with specified domain object.
@param obj domain object
methods.name: clearTasks
methods.comment: Clear all tasks associated with specified domain object.

methods.name: taskFailed
methods.comment:
Notification from the BackgroundCommandTask that the given command
 failed. Any scheduled commands are cleared from the queue.

params.name: monitor
params.comment: task monitor for the background task

methods.javadoc: Clear list of tasks and queue of scheduled commands.
methods.name: dispose
methods.comment: Clear list of tasks and queue of scheduled commands.

name: ToolTaskManager
comment: Manages a queue of background tasks that execute commands.
